import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; const ProductForm = () => { const[newProduct, setNewProudct] = useState({}) axios.post("http://localhost:8000/api/Products") .then(res=>{ console.log(res) }) .catch(err=>{ console.log(err) }) return (
) } export default ProductForm
